title: HARNESS; DEVICES USED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH; WHIPS OR THE LIKE
definition_statement: This place covers: Harnesses and devices used in connection therewith that are suitable for horses or other traction animals; whips in general, e.g. horsewhips, riding crops.

title: Devices in connection with harness, for hitching, reining, training, breaking or quietening horses or other traction animals  (devices of this kind combined with traction harness B68B3/00; stable equipment A01K1/00; devices forming part of a vehicle B62C)
definition_statement: This place covers: Halters; bridles; reins; bits; stranglers; blinkers; devices for preventing bolting; hobbling devices; vaulting harnesses; longeing equipment.

title: Traction harnesses; Traction harnesses combined with devices referred to in group B68B1/00
definition_statement: This place covers: Yokes; horse collars; manufacturing of horse collars; locks for horse collars; breast collars; cruppers; breechings; traces; trace holders.

title: Details or accessories  (haberdashery A44); Fastening devices for bridles, reins, harnesses, or the like  (devices forming part of a vehicle B62C)
definition_statement: This place covers: Fastening devices for traces; tail holders as part of harness; devices for fastening special articles on harnesses, bridles or the like (e.g. feed bags, badges, rosettes); devices for unhitching bolting traction animals.

title: Horse protectors, e.g. resilient attachments  (protective covers B68C5/00)
Devices specially adapted for supporting harnesses when not in use
